--- In gladiator@y..., "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@y...> 
wrote:
> Ok, it looks like this area has become quiet again.  I'll give you 
> guys around 48 hours for some old topic to pick up before I decide 
to 
> post 'The Fifty Project' topic.
> 
> What is this part about?  How to keep track of scores for the 
> tournament and how to decide tie-breakers.  Is there a part 2 to 
this 
> topic?  I don't know yet.

Ok, folks, I know there are 6 other people out there interested in 
playing in a tournament.  Somebody else is going to have to help  
write some rules.  If you are too scared to write rules in this area, 
let me know by email and I will create another yahoo group just to 
work on having a tournament.  The biggest reason I am afraid of 
writing all the rules is someone later coming back and saying the 
rules are UNFAIR and he/she blaming me for writing the rules.  Since I 
am also a moderator of this group, that possibility could put me in a 
very ackward position.  I hope you guys can understand why I am 
hesitating to write all the rules.
